entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 7:11 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:11 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:11 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023
